draw.overall_supervision_plan: The initial risk level was medium. The deliberate rehearsals and COMMEX ensure all SMs are aware of the route plan and contingency plans in place. Additionally, all SMs will have a copy of the Convoy Safety Checklist, on them at all times. The PCCs/PCIs prior to SP will mitigate any faulty load plans and ensure all equipment stays on the truck. Finally, the Convoy Brief will be another reminder for SMs of safe convoy practices, and it will allow for any questions to be asked prior to SP. Due to all the reasons stated above, the residual risk is mitigated to low.
